Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Roche cobas c 501 clinical chemistry analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ProNephro AKI (NGAL) quantitative urine immunoassay for pediatric AKI risk assessment using Roche cobas c 501 analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative immunoassay for NGAL in urine to aid in identifying pediatric ICU patients (≥3 months to <22 years, no underlying kidney disease) at risk for moderate/severe AKI or persistent AKI, used within 24 hours of ICU admission, on Roche cobas c 501 analyzer
